```{r plotcats}
library(lucr)
library(ggplot2)
tic()
fy16testing_transactions <- ld_df %>% filter(as.Date(date_signed) >= as.Date("2015-10-01") & as.Date(date_signed) <= as.Date("2016-09-30"))  
totals <<- fy16testing_transactions %>% group_by(level_1_category) %>% summarise(cat_total = sum(dollars_obligated)) %>% collect()
total_strings <- totals %>% mutate(dollar_totals = to_currency(cat_total, currency_symbol = "$", symbol_first = TRUE, group_size = 3, group_delim = ",", decimal_size = 2,decimal_delim = ".")) %>% collect()                                                                                                     

total_strings %>% filter(is.na(level_1_category) == FALSE)%>%
    ggplot(aes(x=as.factor(level_1_category), y=cat_total, label = dollar_totals) ) + 
    geom_col() +geom_text(angle=90, color = "orange", size = 3, position = position_stack(vjust = 0.5))+
    theme(axis.text.x  = element_text(angle=90, vjust=0.5, size=10))
toc()
```



```{r spark_apply_process process_fy_mini-parqet}
library(tictoc)
source("small_business.R")
sc <- sparkInit()
tic()
fy16 <- load_spark_parquet("../../GWCM_Extracts/fy16_mini_raw_06Mar18.prq/")
toc()

tic()

designated_fy_16 <- columnar_small_business_desig(fy16 %>% collect())

toc()
tic()
save(designated_fy_16, file = "FY18_sb_exclusions06MAR18.Rdata")
toc()

fy_16_dept_SBGR <- spark_small_business_goaling_report(designated_fy_16)

```


```{r fy_small_business_vendor_count}

bic_vendor_spark_src <- ld_df %>% filter(as.Date(date_signed) >= as.date("2016-10-01") & as.Date(date_signed) <= as.date("2017-09-30") ) %>%
    filter(official_bic_flag == "Y" & level_1_category_group =="GWCM") %>% 
     group_by (vendor_duns_number, vendor_name)  %>%
     summarise(obligations = sum(dollars_obligated)) %>%
     arrange(desc(obligations)) %>% collect()

bic_vendor_by_contract_spark_src <- ld_df %>% filter(as.Date(date_signed) >= as.date("2016-10-01") & as.Date(date_signed) <= as.date("2017-09-30") ) %>%
    filter(official_bic_flag == "Y" & level_1_category_group =="GWCM") %>% 
     group_by (contract_name, vendor_duns_number, vendor_name)  %>%
     summarise(obligations = sum(dollars_obligated)) %>%
     arrange(contract_name, desc(obligations)) %>% collect()

```
